author: virtualastronomer
description: Description: Pyraf ScriptsHomepage URL: http://www.lancesimms.com/programs/Python/pyraf/as a new answer to an earlier Questions post, astropython.org reader Lance Simms contributed a link to his pyraf scripts. a quick perusal of the link store reveals a range of examples from pyraf calls to ccmap and daofind to a  SQL database storage example.  thanks, Lance!
title: User contributed pyraf scripts
